wikitext.*:
{{quote|One day you'll wish that you had not said that. Ape!|[[Uglúk]]<ref name="UH"/>}}
'''Apes''' were animals living [[Far Harad|far South]] of [[Middle-earth]]. 

Said to live in the dark forests of the South,<ref>{{HM|TT}}, "[[Helm's Deep (chapter)|Helm's Deep]]"</ref> they seem to have only been known in stories in the North. Probably due to their lesser intelligence, the word "ape", along with "maggot" and ''[[snaga]]'', became an insult used by [[Orcs]].<ref name="UH">{{HM|TT}}, "[[The Uruk-hai]]"</ref>
==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''1995: ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]—[[Creatures of Middle-earth (2nd edition)|Creatures of Middle-earth]]''''' 
:Grey Apes are described as living in the forests of Pel in the far south. They're called ''Cijuvu Niavi'' in the tongue of Pel and ''Peredrûgwath'' in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{ICE|2012}}, p. 78</ref>
